name: 2021: A space odyssey
description:
Try to travel as many light years as possible! But keep your fuel and oxygen in check. Those pretty little planets might be useful to you, landing on them is no easy feat.

Hi! This is my first game ever for my first Game jam ever (Ludum Dare 48).

So much effort in the last 72 hours, but it was worth it! I hope you enjoy it.

🎵 The soundtrack is the orchestral suite “The Planets” by Gustav Holst. (Thank you Eva for the suggestion 💗)

29th April 2021: added Mac and Linux versions
